name: Super Fall Guy
description:
WASD to move.

Space bar to jump.

G to switch gravity.

F to ragdoll.

Each level consists of a premade randomly generated map. This means it won't be different every time you play but each level was randomly generated beforehand.

Fly around and collect stars, each level you must get 5 stars to progress. 

DISCLAIMER: Some stars may spawn under the map but you can easily go under by going off the side.
